entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `profile_url` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `partner_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, `image_url` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`partner_id`) REFERENCES `chat_users`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION )

indices.name: index_chat_rooms_partner_id
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_chat_rooms_partner_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`partner_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `sender_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `chat_room_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`sender_id`) REFERENCES `chat_users`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`chat_room_id`) REFERENCES `chat_rooms`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_messages_sender_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_messages_sender_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sender_id`)

indices.name: index_messages_chat_room_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_messages_chat_room_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chat_room_id`)

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT cr.*, m.content lastMessage, m.timestamp lastMessageTimestamp
        FROM chat_rooms cr 
        INNER JOIN messages m ON m.chat_room_id = cr.id
        WHERE m.id = (
            SELECT id
            FROM messages
            WHERE chat_room_id = cr.id
            ORDER BY timestamp DESC
            LIMIT 1
        )

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
